name: autokitteh
description: Autokitteh is an event-driven automation framework for building workflows using Python. It integrates with APIs and triggers actions via YAML definitions, ideal for self-hosting lightweight automation tasks.
features: Event-Driven Automation: Build workflows triggered by events. Reactive automation.
Python Workflows: Write automation logic in Python. Familiar language.
API Integration: Connect to external APIs and services. Extend capabilities.
YAML Configuration: Define workflows in simple YAML files. Easy setup.
Lightweight: Minimal resource usage for efficient automation. Fast execution.
Self-Hosted: Run automation on your own infrastructure. Complete control.
Flexible Triggers: React to various events and conditions. Powerful automation.
Developer-Friendly: Built for developers who code. Technical approach.
